column4: the actual food was overpriced and unimaginative.  My friend ordered a $9 "salad" which was simply greens in dressing.  My orange juice was tiny and very expensive (can't remember how much but I do remember feeling ripped off).  Nice atmosphere but I would recommend coming here when you're ready to spend your paycheck on baked goods as opposed to a filling meal.
